channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WordPress File Sharing Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WordPress File Sharing Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-4836|2024-08-02T07:38:00.875Z -- unknown -- wordpress%20file%20sharing%20plugin
item.description: The WordPress File Sharing Plugin WordPress plugin before 2.0.5 does not check authorization before displaying files and folders, allowing users to gain access to those filed by manipulating IDs which can easily be brute forced
